text: Brihadeshwara Temple (also called Gangaikonda Cholapuram temple and Gangaikondacholeeswaram) is a Hindu temple dedicated to Shiva located in Gangaikonda Cholapuram, Ariyalur district, in the South Indian state of Tamil Nadu. ==Other websites== * Unesco Great Living Chola Temples Category:World Heritage Sites in India Category:Hindu temples Category:Temples in India Category:11th-century establishments in Asia Category:Establishments in India
title: Brihadisvara Temple, Gangaikonda Cholapuram
